trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"> </xref> gli eventi di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>evento viene generato quando il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllare le modifiche.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>evento viene generato quando il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>le modifiche alle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventHandler, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [NIB: eventi e delegati](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
